testcase.name: As a manager, I search the hotel with registered data.
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Home Page..................................................passed And Click on Log in link....................................................passed And Click on user name text box and type it "manager2"......................passed And Click on password name text box and type it "Man1ager2!"................passed And Click login button......................................................passed And Click on Hotel Management Management button.............................passed And Click on Click on Hotel List button.....................................passed And Click on Name text box and type hotel name "Bugshooter Hotel"...........passed And Click on search button..................................................passed Then Verify the hotel name is correct "Bugshooter Hotel"....................passed
